participant_1.background:
I have never been arrested, but I sometimes need to be alone to clear my head.
i am a mother of two.
i am touring with frank ocean.
i love to ride my bike.
i am a student.

participant_2.background:
I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine.
My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about medicine and dust allergies.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
Doing great, just finished volunteering at the local animal shelter.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I love animals. I have two dogs of my own.
That's great! I have two dogs as well. They're my best friends.
That's awesome! I love spending time with my dogs. They make me so happy.
Me too! They're always there to make me smile.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to exercise, read, and watch movies.
Oh, that sounds like me! I love to exercise and I love to read. I also like to watch movies.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Maybe we should hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to hang out with you.
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans.
